content.rendered: I met Raks at the Hackney Wick flea market. I got there a bit late and things were winding down. I’ll try and arrive earlier next time – it looked like it had been a lovely day, music and dancing in the warm sunshine going on beside the stalls of food, clothes and nicknacks. Raks was packing up and offered me a delicious cup of chai.
